corrected: alaṁ puṇṇa tiṭṭhata etaṁ mā maṁ etaṁ pucchi iti

corrected: alaṁ puṇṇa tiṭṭhata etaṁ mā maṁ etaṁ pucchi iti

analyzed: etam khalu te aha puṇṇa na alattha
corrected: etam kho te aham puṇṇa na alattha

original: nacirasseva—yassatthāya kulaputtā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti, Tadanuttaraṁ—brahmacariyapariyosānaṁ
analyzed: kula puttā sammat eva agārasmai anagāriyam pabbajanti tad anuttara brahmacariya pariyosāna
corrected: nacirasseva yassa atthāya kula puttā sammadeva agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajanti tad anuttaraṁ brahmacariya pariyosānaṁ

original: “Khīṇā jāti, vusitaṁ brahmacariyaṁ, kataṁ karaṇīyaṁ, nāparaṁ itthattāyā”ti abbhaññāsi.
analyzed: vusitam brahmacariya katam karaṇīya na aparam itthattāya ati
corrected: Khīṇā jāti vusitam brahmacariyam katam karaṇīyam na aparam itthattāya ti abbhaññāsi
